website_summaries.verdict: An exceedingly popular canopy, this fantastic product is a sleek and reliable luxury for almost any bed.
pros: Men comment that they appreciate the canopy's gender neutral appearance
Couples and singles alike agree that this bed adds a sense of romance to their room
Customers appreciate the canopy's high quality and durability
cons: Does not include hooks to fasten into ceiling, but has loops specifically designed for four-poster beds

customer_reviews.title: Hey... To all ye men out there ...
customer_reviews.text: Hey... To all ye men out there, listen up. Your Ol' Lady would be really surprised if she came home and saw this above the bed. ;-) My Wife LOVES IT! Also if you've recently messed up, from a Dozen Roses, hand her a SINGLE ROSE and say... Baby, I'm sorry. I screwed up, I admit that and I'm sorry. Now from behind your back, hand her the 11 Roses and say, Now Baby This is for all the other times I'm gonna screw up. My Wife loves that one too.
customer_reviews.author: TIBER SEPTIM

customer_reviews.title: Great for Renters!
customer_reviews.text: If you're looking to add a little whimsy to your bedroom this is the perfect addition. I think every loves the idea of a canopy over their bed and this is a great price for one. I will say that it's quite difficult to hang this up yourself. I live alone and found myself really struggling to untangle it and put it up. I can't attach anything permanently to my walls or ceiling in my apartment, so I threw some command hooks up on my ceiling and it works perfectly. It's heavy enough to give some great draping, but not too heavy that it pulls down the hooks.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia Rohde

customer_reviews.title: Does the job.
customer_reviews.text: Lots of material. It took a lot of adjustments to get it to look good and not like a large saggy piece of material hanging over my bed. Once completed it looked world's better. I twisted the material multiple times over the front and back cross bars so the seams wouldn't sag. But could not do the same for the outer cross bars given how the canopy is sewn. So the outer seams do not line up with the bar. Still looks relaxing and does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Cdove

customer_reviews.title: too big for one thing
customer_reviews.text: The listing said it was good for all be sizes but was way too big for my full size bed. I had it up for awhile and when I decided to take it down noticed where there had been a rather long tear in the netting that had been poorly stitched together with rather large stitches in a thread color that did not match. Very disappointed. Save your money
customer_reviews.author: kim

customer_reviews.title: Exactly the look I was going for
customer_reviews.text: This was super easy to hang above the bed! It was exactly what I wanted and the look I was going for!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Sides do not close, so bugs fly in
customer_reviews.text: Overlap is too small: only 1' 8" on top, so sides flare wide open towards the bottom and bugs fly in. Synthetic material picks up static charge that pushes sides apart and opens gaps even where sides do overlap. To close the gap, I stitched 4 * 9' of sewing thread from bottom all the way up on all 4 sides. I do not expect stitched drapes to survive washing, as stitching should tear the drapes and make them unusable.
customer_reviews.author: aebteacher

customer_reviews.title: Super glam for cheap. Easy instal
customer_reviews.text: Easy set up for maximum pay off. Turns any drab bed into a more magical space. Used inside only. I’ve had mine for years now and it’s till good!
customer_reviews.author: Sonia Graves

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty and arrived in perfect condition
customer_reviews.text: Loved that it did not need steam or iron as shears do. You just pull it out of the package and hang up. It looks great in my daughter's room and drapes very nicely from a normal sized ceiling height. The ceiling anchors provided do not do the trick. You will need the metal anchors, especially if you are worried as we were that the canopy might get trapped underfoot and pulled down. It comes with simple ties that look a little like shoe laces, but you can buy ribbon or more fancy ties, if you want to dress up the look.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Woodhead

customer_reviews.title: It's good, with some tweeking
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for y little girl's twin sized bed. This would look much better on a queen or even king.. There is a lot of extra fabric up at the top, which hangs down to almost the bed. I live in a very old house with very high celling and there was still a lot of pinning and tacking that needed to be done to the material closest to the celling.. It's very thin and offers no privacy. It's good, but like I said, you have to 'customize it'.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: just pretty doesn't count anymore
customer_reviews.text: Quite pretty, but not an actual functioning mosquito net. Description says "Functional mosquito net keeps small insects out". Not true. There isn't sufficient material to cover the bed. There are 2 pieces on the top the come apart and all the mesh on the sides of the bed are too small to actually over the bed. But, pretty. Well... just pretty doesn't count anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: For some reason though the ends aren't someone to the holder so it like totally sags
customer_reviews.text: This is almost what I wanted. For some reason though the ends aren't someone to the holder so it like totally sags. I had to take it to a Taylor to get it song. It's literally like it's just not finished. Only reason I kept it was because it was the color I was looking for and I haven't been able to find it anywhere else
customer_reviews.author: L.Smiley

customer_reviews.title: Awesome canopy for a child's room
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter who begged me for a "princess room." It was very easy to install and it is very beautiful. It's soft, unlike some of the netting others are selling, but it's not quite as soft or fragile as the decorative ones....so I'd say this product is the perfect halfway point between a decoration and a functional mosquito net. My chihuahua keeps rolling in the excess on the floor and it has yet to tear, to my surprise. If you're looking for a canopy for a child's room, this is the best one.
customer_reviews.author: Shaylene M

customer_reviews.title: Looks beautiful, but there 2 minor issues It is very ...
customer_reviews.text: Looks beautiful, but there 2 minor issues It is very easy to rip. It is not the easiest to assemble. However once you figure out the rhythm of hanging it, it gets easier. Overall, the price point makes this item a perfectly affordable way to spruce up the bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice canopy
customer_reviews.text: Giving this 4 stars only because the directions are horrible haha. Literally wasn't any help at all! Just make sure to find all 4 ends of the canopy and shake it out before u tangle it all. The quality of this is pretty well. The canopy isn't too long either. Will submit a better photo later since this was a pano photo for a friend lol
customer_reviews.author: kayla

customer_reviews.title: This was just terrible, the photos make it look lush and beautiful ...
customer_reviews.text: This was just terrible, the photos make it look lush and beautiful but it is none of those things. Much more of an industrial legit mosquito look than a pretty flowing canopy.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty
customer_reviews.text: Perfect and exact but be careful not to rub anything sharp through it as it can run, but it is pretty durable and very elegant
customer_reviews.author: kelly fisher

customer_reviews.title: the illustration didn't show that each of the four sides was made up of two separate loose panels that would easily move to allo
customer_reviews.text: this canopy didn't work well for my application. I was concerned mainly with mosquito protection rather than the decorative nature of the canopy. When ordering, the illustration didn't show that each of the four sides was made up of two separate loose panels that would easily move to allow mosquito entry. Also, the stitching on the top panel was defective such that the top panel did not connect with one end of the canopy.
customer_reviews.author: jack schmid

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful canopy
customer_reviews.text: Lovely canopy. Other reviewers mentioned I would have to pin the center to the ceiling, which is true. So instead of 4 points attached to the ceiling I have 5 and its great. If I was using as a mosquito net it would definitely NOT do the trick as most of the entries do not fully close, however, I keep mine tied open and its simply for the look. Beautiful canopy.
customer_reviews.author: Dr.RG

customer_reviews.title: It's worth it
customer_reviews.text: I have the one in Ecru. Is very beautiful and looks more expensive than it is. Not sure about reviewers saying it is difficult to install. My husband is quite handy and used some additional odds and ends in his tool box to hang it. So very sturdy and hasn't torn even with an occasional tug from my little 20lb mutt and the curiosity of my 16 month old grandson. I say it was worth it. Hangs just beautifully over my queen size, low profile bed from Ikea and creates a very intimate ambiance.
customer_reviews.author: Elise

customer_reviews.title: Pretty product for a great price!
customer_reviews.text: Love this bed canopy! Great price for a great item. Happy with the material and it was exactly as I expected. I don't have a 4 poster bed but I plan to hang it with hooks and tie back the draped sides with pretty sheer black ribbon I purchased from a craft store. I also purchased warm fairy lights from Amazon as well, to hang above the canopy on the ceiling and/or wall! Also, this product came with hooks and had I known I would not have purchased my own separetely on here. Never hurts to have extra hooks though!
customer_reviews.author: Ariel

customer_reviews.title: I Love My Canopy Bed Now
customer_reviews.text: I Love My Canopy Bed Now:-) It was a little bit too big but I made it work. It said that u could either hang it from the ceiling or on your canopy bed frame (which I did) but it was too much fabric hanging down on the top (when ur laying down on the bed and looking up) but I just took equal amounts of fabric on each side and draped it over, so there was a little loop on each side. Just like a curtain. It looks Amazing!!!! I Love It!! but that's the only reason I gave it 4 stars, other than that, It's Perfect! :-)
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Helps section off love it !
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love it ! moving into a studio apartment and having to section off the bedroom area this really helped!
customer_reviews.author: berry

customer_reviews.title: Fooled
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed!! There are openings all over the net top and the opening to enter and exit staying open and it's not lapping so mosquitoes will come in. Pointless and also it's very thin and scanty no elegance like the picture advertise. Very misleading. I got fooled
customer_reviews.author: Celia R.

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: Looks gorgeous over my bed in my Moroccan themed room.
customer_reviews.author: Trent Emory

customer_reviews.title: NOT FOR A 4-POST BED!
customer_reviews.text: I got a 4 post bed and was hoping to have a canopy around it. This canopy is obviously meant to hang from the ceiling. It is WAY too long. I messed with it, and messed with it, and messed with it... It just does NOT work well for a 4 post bed. I'm sure this will work just fine for those who get this to hang from their ceiling though.
customer_reviews.author: MicaelaRenee

customer_reviews.title: Cute bed
customer_reviews.text: I have had it for 3 yrs. It's perfect for temp use and renters. It is tricky to assemble the first time, because the directions are awful. But after that, it's easy to put together and take apart. It works for me. I store shoe boxes under it, so perfect for small spaces. I have moved 3 times, and it's still intact. Price was awesome for the quality and cuteness effect.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Great for a frilly bed canopy
customer_reviews.text: Great for a frilly bed canopy, I bought this as a patio mosquito net and the TOP overhang is two pieces of fabric ( not one straight strip of fabric) so Mosquitos can get in the top. I had to sew the top and even the sides together to make it work. And it was short when I hung it on our canopy over our balcony.
customer_reviews.author: Summer

customer_reviews.title: Ok for ceiling use, canopy use is a bit large.
customer_reviews.text: I guess I am rating it as 3 stars for purpose I used it for. I have a queen canopy bed, if you were to attach it to the posts themselves this will be very large. The middle almost dropped down to the actual bed itself. My canopy also came with a hole in it. Ive actually had to tie the extra fabric into little knots near the post to make it fit the bed post and be usable. Besides all that it is ok. Typical mosquito netting. Nothing fancy. Wish it came in sizes.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret kugler

customer_reviews.title: Would Buy Again!
customer_reviews.text: This canopy is beautiful! I purchased it in Ecru for my full bed. I used command hooks instead of the hooks supplied within the package and they works just fine!
customer_reviews.author: Natasha Brzoska

customer_reviews.title: Curtain ties!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to actually use on a four poster canopy bed for my daughter. The really cool thing is the top parameter of the material has a bit of elastic in it. It allows it to snuggly but not overly noticeably fit the top of the canopy with out it coming off. And keeps it from sliding one way or another. The only thing is... Don't forget to buy curtain ties to pull the material back. I forgot.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey M.

customer_reviews.title: Looks great!
customer_reviews.text: The canopy came well packaged and was easy to hang. I've got a queen-sized bed and hung this from the ceiling (as pictured in the stock photo)-looks as it does in the stock photo and is appropriate for the level of shabby-chic that I was going for. For those looking for a more "polished" canopy, be forewarned that there are unfinished and unevenly cut edges as other reviewers have mentioned. When hung they aren't noticeable but I could see how some might be disappointed. I couldn't beat it for the price though! A great deal for a great look!
customer_reviews.author: D. Farrell

customer_reviews.title: Quality Canopy
customer_reviews.text: A bit daunting to put together but very chic and pretty! I added lights’
customer_reviews.author: SoExtra

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love this hanging over the bed but instead of it ...
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this hanging over the bed but instead of it coming with 4 screws, it only came with 3. Other than that it's beautiful and hangs to the floor. I hand washed this since I had this and it can be a handful only because there is so much material.
customer_reviews.author: Cynn Badd

customer_reviews.title: Really ties a room together
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing! It comes all the way down to the floor. It's not as short as the picture shows which is a good thing for me. It comes with the hardware but you have to purchase your own tie backs. I used black satin ribbon. The shipping time was pretty decent as well. I would buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Kristy

customer_reviews.title: I love this and for the price it is perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This adds a bit of dreamy-ness to my bedroom. You cannot beat the price with regards to a bed canopy and I did quite a bit of searching. It was very easy to install. The middle panel does hang quite low but very easily fixable as I like that there is a bit to play with so that I am able to style it how I like. Sweet dreams :)
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine

customer_reviews.title: easy install, looks nice
customer_reviews.text: easy enough to install, looks good kinda cheap material, don't pull or try to hang on it wont keep insects out, just for looks creates a nice mood effect around the bed watching shadows pass through it at night can be cool
customer_reviews.author: Real Review

customer_reviews.title: worst net ever
customer_reviews.text: worst net ever. if you don't need a bug proof net this is the one as no seams are sewn shut even on top. craftsmanship terrible doesn't keep anything out....
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Great canopy
customer_reviews.text: Looks even better in person than it does in photos. Not crazy about the middle section that goes over the mattress because it is two separate pieces instead of one giant one, and this makes an unattractive gap if you do not hang the corners far enough apart. Overall it's a great canopy that's worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Haley

customer_reviews.title: i have queen bed and it fit it perfectly i am so in love! it makes my room feel so romantic and ...
customer_reviews.text: I just got my canopy yesterday and put it up quickly, i have queen bed and it fit it perfectly i am so in love! it makes my room feel so romantic and relaxing its perfect! Its a great buy for anyone looking for something to spruce up their room. The only thing i would advise is to buy your own ties for the canopy because the tie backs it comes with aren't the greatest. Hope this helps!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: This was a great purchase. It changed my space from cold and boring to dreamy. Once it is up, it gives the effect displayed in the picture. Good money spent.
customer_reviews.author: EvelynTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful addition to a bedroom
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to put over my daughters full sized bed. It was very easy to put up and looks gorgeous over her bed. We have had it up for close to 4 months now and it is holding up to the wear and tear a 14 year old girl can put it through. I would recommend this to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal T

customer_reviews.title: It looks great! When I took it down for a few ...
customer_reviews.text: It was a little bigger than I expected but I just pinned up the middle and the middle of the sides. It looks great! When I took it down for a few days my room had felt naked without it.
customer_reviews.author: Erica Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Some Creative Assembly Required
customer_reviews.text: A bit too big for a twin-size, I had to do some intense looping and draping of fabric without having to do battle with the netting at four in the A.M. It does nice, though, pretty and airy, and looks charming to the bohemian flair in me with some twinkling fairy lights. I would give it a 5, but the only issues I had were with the hooks provided, being a bit too flimsy to hold the fabric up on the wall.
customer_reviews.author: Sara A.

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous Canopy Netting
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived on 1/29/14 prior to estimated delivery date. Item is perfect for my king four poster canopy bed. I like that the material was elastic enough to stretch across canopy rails. I was also able to stretch the netting enough so that center folds overlap creating a perfect seamless top. I have photos if you'd like me to send to you.
customer_reviews.author: MsNic

customer_reviews.title: Loving my sexy, gothic smoosh room!
customer_reviews.text: It took me a minute to figure out that the canopy had a ceiling and I had to rearrange it a few times, but I love it! I have a black wrought iron four poster bed with a canopy. It's gorgeous and fancy but the only problem is that this canopy is really king sized and my bed is queen. I didn't attach mine to the ceiling. I actually hung it off my canopy bars, so it was ackward and droopy in places. But I worked with it and used black zipties to pinch close the saggiest areas and it looks super sexy.
customer_reviews.author: Pepper Anne

customer_reviews.title: Nice Product - Very Cool Looking!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this because my wife found it online and thought that it was pretty but the fact is that I enjoy it as much as she does. This very inexpensive item makes our room look like a palace. It really is very nice, easy to install and very attractive. We bunched up the corners so ours looks a little different than the stock photos but it turned out very nice. We also made ours flat to the ceiling so that it didn't hang down like the stock photo and it turns out much better.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Martin

customer_reviews.title: beautiful and simple touch to any bedroom.
customer_reviews.text: great accent for any bedroom and also keeps bugs out.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: I love the new style my bedroom has and cannot wait ...
customer_reviews.text: The lovely and romantic look I was hoping for was made a reality with this canopy. It comes with the hooks and the ropes to tie the 4 ends. I love the new style my bedroom has and cannot wait to continue the decoration for the holidays in the bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: Lilliam Mendoza

customer_reviews.title: Reaping the lacy rewards! oh yea!
customer_reviews.text: OK, so i read all the reviews and took the chance by purchasing this product. WOW, I'm loving it right from the box. First let me say that I have a King size poster bed and it fits exactly like it was measured and tailored to fit. The material is as I expected (lace type), I installed the whole thing in 10 minutes. My GF loves it and that is priceless! Thank you Heavenly!
customer_reviews.author: Phillip Kleshick

customer_reviews.title: Nice canopy for poster bed however somewhat transparent
customer_reviews.text: Not as dark as I hoped it would be, i.e. very transparent. Lies well on my queen size poster bed though
customer_reviews.author: Marcos

customer_reviews.title: great as a window curtain
customer_reviews.text: Great. I bought these to make a bed canopy, but realize my ceiling is way too tall, and I am not sure how crazy my landlord would be about me hanging things from the ceiling.. so I used them as curtains on my window and they look great!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: It is awkward to assemble and no matter what you do it will not look like the picture
customer_reviews.text: Keeps me safe from 'skeeters. It is awkward to assemble and no matter what you do it will not look like the picture. Don't beat yourself up over it.
customer_reviews.author: rianna weisse

customer_reviews.title: nice (:
customer_reviews.text: Minus the few tears that it came with, this is a nice size and quality canopy for its price. The tears are very easy to fix. I refuse to make holes in my ceiling so instead of the hooks, I used clear adhesive clips that were purchased at target. I took off one start for slow shipping and the tears.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: i LIKE IT VERY MUCH
customer_reviews.text: THIS IS FUN AND ROMANTIC AND LOOKS GREAT. I ENJOY IT AND WOULD RECOMMEND IT BASED ON ITS REASONABLE PRICE. IT IS HARD TO HAND AND WILL NOT REALLY STAY IN PLACE TO WELL. NOT GOOD IF YOU HAVE PLAYFUL CATS. WOULD LIKE ANOTHER ONE THOUGH AMYBE IN DIFFERENT COLOR.
customer_reviews.author: Lisle

customer_reviews.title: if I did not have a cat...I would buy again
customer_reviews.text: This is a cheap way to get that canopy look. was very easy to use and I was happy with the purchase
customer_reviews.author: Peachzpooh

customer_reviews.title: They were great!
customer_reviews.text: We had ours up for years. We loved them. But once we had kids, it was ripped down.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Allison

customer_reviews.title: Feeling like a Queen
customer_reviews.text: this amazing little trick made my room all tied together to have elegance and a 'magic' feel too it. I am very happy and pleased with the results of my canopy. I would recommend this to anymore looking to adding more of a princess/queen like look to their room!
customer_reviews.author: Miss Mae

customer_reviews.title: and it's a little too big for my full size bed but it's fantastic! Very elegant and ties my room together
customer_reviews.text: It was a little hard to understand, and it's a little too big for my full size bed but it's fantastic! Very elegant and ties my room together
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I really liked this over my bed
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this over my bed, I don't recommend if you have cats. Mine pulled it down a lot and it started to have a lot of holes
customer_reviews.author: Emilie D. Aronson

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: The seams seemed to be a little off, but that's nothing some safety pins can't fix. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Jas

customer_reviews.title: Looks Great
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my teen daughter to go over her full size bed. It is very large and was droopy when hung per the directions. Would have been better for a King size bed. I just made a few tweeks to it and it looks great. Not difficult to hang either.
customer_reviews.author: kayjaykay

customer_reviews.title: love!
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly over my queen size bed, enough slack for a king, looks romantic and just what I wanted for my rooms look. Different ways to tie to fit your space
customer_reviews.author: Megan Sampson

customer_reviews.title: So happy with this
customer_reviews.text: So happy with this. Many reviews I saw mentioned the quality... this is a sheer, lightweight canopy but it looks great. Easy to put up - came with ceiling hooks and all. I have a dressy bedding set, and this is the perfect compliment to it!
customer_reviews.author: CottonCandy

customer_reviews.title: Torn but still good
customer_reviews.text: This came torn on one side but I needed it quickly and didn't have time to replace it, however if you're lucky enough to get a perfect one, it is, well, perfect.
customer_reviews.author: jessie

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed. Poorly constructed
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. Poorly constructed, cheap netting, & the top is not sewn on all 4 sides so keeping bugs out is impossible. I'll be sending this back!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Adds so much drama to a room
customer_reviews.text: I fixed this up over my full sized bed - it was a little too droopy, so I got some more hooks and held it up in the middles of the sides as well as the corners - worked like a charm.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful! Takes a little time to hang by yourself, but it's doable!
customer_reviews.author: Brandy B.

customer_reviews.title: Easily torn. I steam mine and that seems to ...
customer_reviews.text: challenging to put up and hard to clean. Easily torn. I steam mine and that seems to work. will replace with solid cloth one that I can wash.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: Great Deal!
customer_reviews.text: I shopped around many places before buying this one, the quality is better than anything else at this same price point. My daughter has a queen size bed and it fits perfectly, she absolutely loves it.
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: Gave this to a friend who has been getting bitten ...
customer_reviews.text: Gave this to a friend who has been getting bitten by mosquitos every night. This design was not as feminine as some of the other canopies.
customer_reviews.author: L. Russell

customer_reviews.title: Would be great if you could choose a size
customer_reviews.text: Very large! Way too big for my daughters full size canopy bed. Had to hang from ceiling which took a lot of work. Would be great if you could choose a size. Definetly not one size fits all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Touch of elegance
customer_reviews.text: Elegant touch to your four poster bed. Be careful not to snag it as it will rip.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Timms

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love it. I added thumbtacks to some areas to give it a different look and it hold nicely.
customer_reviews.author: NZiegler

customer_reviews.title: but these are absolutely beautiful! They're sturdy and feel well-made
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting something cheap because of the price, but these are absolutely beautiful! They're sturdy and feel well-made, the color is gorgeous, and they're definitely long enough for what I'm using them for :) I love these!
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: Great product. It gave my bedroom a sexy Moroccan ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product. It gave my bedroom a sexy Moroccan feel. Unfortunately, my cats loved it as well. I would highly recommend this product, as long as you don't have cats.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Great...
customer_reviews.text: The color is perfect and I am very excited to use this item. I'm not hanging it until I move but I can't wait. It was delivered the day before I expected it which was nice. Seems to always happen that way when using amazon:)
customer_reviews.author: Whit

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy setup and a gorgeous end result. Hooks were included and it came packaged very nicely. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Nikky

customer_reviews.title: Probably should be cheaper but overall very pleased!
customer_reviews.text: Adorable little accent for my room. Didn't want to paint the walls and I wanted something to make my new bedroom look homey and comfortable. It's not going to block any light, definitely more for show.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Great price, decent quality, fairy-tale feel!
customer_reviews.text: We haven't put this canopy up permanently, but it is nice and billowy, and definitely looks fun.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander Hayes

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very beautiful. Easy to put up. It was fun to put up & decorate extra room.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie

customer_reviews.title: Love this canopy
customer_reviews.text: Love this canopy! Makes my bed feel extra snugly. I bought little LED twinkle lights to put on top of it as well.
customer_reviews.author: Skippy

customer_reviews.title: Not functional!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this first and foremost as a mosquito net, with the romantic look being a bonus. But there are gaps where the material isn't connected, like the top unconnected to the side, and where the curtains parts, there should be overlapping when you bring them together, rather than not quite coming together at the corners.
customer_reviews.author: Maestra CK

customer_reviews.title: Always wanted a canopy now I have one
customer_reviews.text: I have always wanted a canopy style bed since I was a tiny little girl. I now finally have a canopy without having to have an actual four poster canopy bed. I enjoy this canopy every time I lay down in my bed. It was easy to install above my bed and looks nice hanging from my nine foot ceilings. I get compliments on it whenever someone sees my room for the first time even guys like the look of it. If you want to feel like a princess or queen in your own bedroom, order this!
customer_reviews.author: MissMichelle

customer_reviews.title: Nice and Uncomplicated.
customer_reviews.text: Fits nicely over a queen size bed, can be a little tricky to untangle it so be careful folding it up or taking it down. Material is slightly cheap but hasn't caused any issues or torn. Shorter than I would have originally liked but still long enough to close all around the bed.
customer_reviews.author: David J.

customer_reviews.title: I really loved this when it was first up in my daughter's ...
customer_reviews.text: I really loved this when it was first up in my daughter's room. It's been 3 weeks and the net has torn away from the sturdy part that you hang.
customer_reviews.author: Janelle Hendrickson

customer_reviews.title: Just as pictured.
customer_reviews.text: Looks great in my teenagers room. She loves it. Easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Feels like I'm Sleeping up in Heaven with my four Heavenly post canopy net bed, it keeps me in a protected mode with angels watching over........with sweet blessed dreams ahead lol.......good day!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Faafetai Taimane E.D Mausali Iosefa

customer_reviews.title: Works on high ceilings
customer_reviews.text: I managed to make this work over my twin size bed in my dorm room. It is very cut but I don't like how it is not completely connected in sections.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy L. Haslam

customer_reviews.title: Need to purchase a new one as mine is pretty old and cat kinda tore it up
customer_reviews.text: Need to purchase a new one as mine is pretty old and cat kinda tore it up. Looks very elegant!
customer_reviews.author: Dd07

customer_reviews.title: Loved the way it looked setup but the hooks are ...
customer_reviews.text: Loved the way it looked setup but the hooks are too small to hang for a long period of time
customer_reviews.author: Bianca

customer_reviews.title: Adds a lot to the room quickly - but get ready to be creative!
customer_reviews.text: I really LOVE my canopy. People always comment on it and it makes my room a bohemian love castle, just saying. BUT it took me a long time to get it up (high ceilings) and then it was really hangy so I had to use my creativity to make it look good. I didn't like how much it fell in the middle, so I pinned the middle to the ceiling. Be creative and it will be a perfect room statement!
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: I installed it and she loved it!
customer_reviews.text: Bought it as a gift, I installed it and she loved it!
customer_reviews.author: MC

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great accent to a bed without a headboard or frame.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Whitaker

customer_reviews.title: Love Love Love this words can't even describe how much ...
customer_reviews.text: Love Love Love this words can't even describe how much I love this the best part of my room is this canopy wish I could give it more stars five stars
customer_reviews.author: MayMay

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: It didn't come with any of the ties, plastic anchors or ceiling screw hooks.
customer_reviews.author: DET

customer_reviews.title: Really only fits a king WAY too big for queen ...
customer_reviews.text: Really only fits a king WAY too big for queen and no reasonable way to adjust it. Was already ripped / shredded in theee areas when I opened it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Okay product
customer_reviews.text: Not the greatest material, but for the price it seems appropriate. I have a full size bed, but this canopy is definitely too big for that. It draped so far down that I had to use a push pin to pin the middle to the ceiling. It looks nice, but I wish it had been smaller.
customer_reviews.author: jackie

customer_reviews.title: When you first open this it reallt does look like a mosquito net
customer_reviews.text: When you first open this it reallt does look like a mosquito net. After putting it on my bed it looks amazing. I love it. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Audrey

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Holds to much dust and if you do wash it be prepared to spend an hour untangling it!
customer_reviews.author: Debra Allen

customer_reviews.title: you just have to adjust it a bit and it looks great, i probably wouldn't buy it for a twin ...
customer_reviews.text: very cute, one size fits all is correct, you just have to adjust it a bit and it looks great, i probably wouldn't buy it for a twin sized bed though
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Heavenly 4 Post Bed Canopy, Burgundy
feature_bullets: Straight panels for airy yet masculine look
Suspends from ceiling or four-poster bed
Functional mosquito net keeps small insects out
Fits all bed sizes; dry cleaning recommended
